## SERVICE\_UNAVAILABLE\_INTERCEPTOR\_PROVIDER variable

Provider for proper use of ServiceUnavailableInterceptor, use this provider to inject this interceptor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
SERVICE_UNAVAILABLE_INTERCEPTOR_PROVIDER: ClassProvider
```
